snippet: The bodies of an American and his Filipino-American wife were found in a well in the central Philippines in a case suspected to be linked to robbery.
abstract: Bodies of American couple Lolly Mangilaya Fleischauer and her husband Kevin Fleischauer are found in a well near their residence in Murcia, Philippines, likely in connection with an earlier robbery of their home.
lead_paragraph: The bodies of an American and his Filipino-American wife were found in a well in the central Philippines in a case suspected to be linked to robbery.
